line_1: To haud the wretch in order;
line_2: Let that ay be your border:

line_1: Bromley and Hanmer cry aloud — to order.
line_2: When rakes begin on blasphemy to border,

line_1: Orion has his belt in order;
line_2: Of Saturn's ring bright shines the border;

line_1: Puts each odoriferous Plant in it's Order;
line_2: The Gard'ner industrious trims out his Border,

line_1: And words that love would call to order;
line_2: With accents that on harshness border,
